name: Fish Tanks
description:
Fish Tanks  is a 1bit inspired game, where you drive in a randomly created maze and fire bullets at your enemies. If any bullets hit your tank, you lose. Both single player and multiplayer are available to play.

The game have been created by using Processing.

_______________________________________________________________________________________

THE TEAM BEHIND FISH TANKS

Tobias Dahl Nielsen: Lead Programmer, Level Designer, Music, Art

Rebecca Veggerby: Assistent Programmer, Level Designer, Art
